name: qr-wasm
description: High-performance QR code and barcode generation module written in Go and compiled to WebAssembly. Provides comprehensive code generation and decoding functions with GoWM integration.
author: Ben

functions.name: generateQRCode
functions.description: Generate QR code from text data with customizable size and error correction level

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: Data to encode in QR code

parameters.name: errorLevel
parameters.description: Error correction level: LOW, MEDIUM, HIGH, HIGHEST (default: MEDIUM)

functions.errorPattern: Returns object with 'error' field on failure

functions.name: generateBarcode
functions.description: Generate barcode from data with specified type and dimensions

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Barcode type: code128, code39, ean13, ean8 (default: code128)

functions.errorPattern: Returns object with 'error' field on failure
functions.example:
const result = qr.call('generateBarcode', '1234567890128', 'ean13', 300, 150);
// Returns: { base64Image: '...', type: 'ean13', width: 300, height: 150 }

functions.name: generateVCard
functions.description: Generate QR code containing vCard contact information

parameters.name: vCardData
parameters.description: Contact information object with name, organization, phone, email, url, address fields

functions.errorPattern: Returns object with 'error' field on failure

functions.name: generateWiFiQR
functions.description: Generate QR code for WiFi network connection

parameters.name: wifiData
parameters.description: WiFi network information with ssid, password, security, hidden fields

functions.errorPattern: Returns object with 'error' field on failure

functions.name: decodeQRCode
functions.description: Decode QR code from base64 image data (limited implementation)
functions.errorPattern: Returns object with 'error' field on failure
functions.example:
const result = qr.call('decodeQRCode', base64ImageData);
// Note: Decoding functionality is limited in current version

functions.name: decodeBarcode
functions.description: Decode barcode from base64 image data (limited implementation)
functions.errorPattern: Returns object with 'error' field on failure
functions.example:
const result = qr.call('decodeBarcode', base64ImageData);
// Note: Decoding functionality is limited in current version

functions.name: getAvailableFunctions
functions.description: Return list of all available functions in the module

functions.name: setSilentMode
functions.description: Enable or disable console logging for operations

parameters.name: silent
parameters.description: True to disable logging, false to enable

functions.example:
qr.call('setSilentMode', true); // Disable logging
qr.call('setSilentMode', false); // Enable logging

examples.title: GoWM Integration - Basic QR Code
vCard Contact QR Generation
WiFi Connection QR Code
Barcode Generation

useCases: Contact sharing via vCard QR codes

changes: Initial release with QR code generation
